p: As summarized in Table 5, our Bayesian phylogenetic analysis showed substitution rate for NS5B HCV 1b and HCV 3a to be 6.8 (5.8–7.9) × 10 −3 and 1.1 (0.7–1.4) × 10 −3 substitutions per site per year, respectively, with a SkyGrid coalescent model, whereas the estimated tMRCAs for HCV 1b and HCV 3a were 1977 (95% highest posterior density, HPD: 1962–1985) and 1965 (95% HPD: 1941–1978), respectively. The estimated evolutionary rates of HIV env and HIV gag were 3.5 (2.5–4.0) × 10 −2 and 13 (8.8–17) × 10 −3 substitutions per site per year, respectively. The likely years of origins of HIV env and gag were estimated to be 1992 (95% HPD: 1990–1993) and 1996 (95% HPD: 1995–1997), respectively.
